column4: Hi guys. I have 10.0.4 running from the thumb drive on my HP ZD7000. It won't see any wireless. Then I plugged in the network cable and ubuntu told me I have Proprietary Hardware Drivers to install. One of which is "Broadcom B43 Wireless Driver". But when I try to "activate" it I get "SystemError: InstallArchives() failed"
import jpg:- as described in man-page?
